src:
和温貞菱情侶共度6小時　林予晞曝光文青聚會內幕
07 Nov 2019, 09:00 by 黃仲義, 楊兆元
林予晞7日為英國茶飲站台，自曝曾經在當空服員時，遭到客人搭訕，甚至有阿拉伯客人一開口，就跟她炫耀，自己家裡有很多駱駝，讓林予晞覺得很逗趣。
林予晞過去曾擔任國泰航空空服員，常常旅遊世界各地，也很容易被客人搭訕，她透露，印象最深刻的，就是一名阿拉伯人向她炫耀，家裡有很多駱駝，讓她笑翻。此外，也曾遇到韓國客人搭訕，向她誇耀，自己是連鎖咖啡店的老闆，不過林予晞都當逗趣的事情在看，沒有認真考慮。林予晞透露，若要能吸引她注意，最好還是聊展覽或是心靈的話題才會有興趣。


林予晞透露，當空服員時常常遭到客人各種方式的搭訕。

日前她和鄭宜農、温貞菱、黃河等好友，曾被鏡週刊拍到聚會六小時，林予晞也引用週刊用語說：「你說文青聚會嗎？其實文青聚會蠻容易睡著的。」林予晞透露，好友聚會通常都是聊天、聊電影居多，但自己不太敢把作品給温貞菱看，「她是一個很直接的人，不太會隱瞞想法，不過她知道我很玻璃心，不會直接批評。」林予晞透露，温貞菱被週刊拍到之後，心情不是很好，但是現在有稍微好一點了。
更新時間｜2019.11.07 09:03
text:
6 hours with Wen Yuling's couple Lin Yuzhen exposed Wenqing party insider
07 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Huang Zhongyi, Yang Zhaoyuan
On the 7th, Lin Yuxi was a British tea drinking platform. When she was exposed to a flight attendant, she was contacted by the guests. Even when the Arab guests opened their mouths, they showed off with her. There were many camels in their homes, which made Lin Yuxi feel very funny.
In the past, Lin Yuxi served as a flight attendant of Cathay Pacific Airways. He often traveled around the world and was easily interviewed by guests. She revealed that the most impressive thing was that an Arab showed off to her and there were many camels at home to make her laugh. In addition, I have met Korean guests to talk to her, boasting that she is the owner of a chain of coffee shops, but Lin Yuxi is a funny thing to look at, did not seriously consider. Lin Yuxi revealed that if you want to attract her attention, it is best to talk about the exhibition or the topic of the heart.


Lin Yuxi revealed that when attending a flight attendant, they are often contacted by various methods.

A few days ago, she and Zheng Yinong, Wen Yuling, Huang He and other friends, had been photographed by the Mirror Weekly for six hours. Lin Yuxi also quoted the weekly magazine saying: "Do you say Wen Qing party? In fact, Wen Qing party is easy to fall asleep." Lin Yuxi revealed that Friends gatherings are usually chats and chat movies, but I don't dare to look at Wen Xiaoling. "She is a very direct person and she doesn't hide her thoughts. But she knows that I am very glassy and will not directly criticize. Lin Yuxi revealed that after Wen Yuling was photographed by the weekly magazine, the mood was not very good, but now it is slightly better.
Update time|2019.11.07 09:03
